Great place for a few drinks, the gin is fantastic and the barman is great even though I understand only 27% of what he says.

This place fits the bill perfectly. Extremely hospitable service, excellent food (Wagyu beautiful and chicken neck the standouts) an...

We get the feeling that it's because we are...
Quiet place for drinks & yakitori. Cash only

Such a good atmosphere! The bartenders are amazing, reasonable price. They have a pingpong table, loads of games and a balance board! It's a great time every time.

Apart from good absinthe, they also have pastis! And several one, french paradise!
The atmosphere is very great too and the bartenders are amazing!

recent_reviews.text_snippet: Small local bar with great selection of warm and cold Japanese cocktails as well as traditional cocktails. Kazu the bartender is great company and a great way to end a day on the slopes! Highly recomm...
Kazu the bartender is amazing! He makes drinks with fresh ingredients that taste wonderful. The bar is under the Heta Nozawa Onsen Hotel. Definitely recommend when in Nozawa!
A true hidden gem. Top level cocktails and great atmosphere. No doubt soon to appear in all the top bars' list.
